L7p:Comment.stringValue: === Required changes can be implemented in policies in the 'Customizations' folder
=== Look for '#OTK id_token configuration' and 'OTK id_token Signing Algorithm - ...'
=== If you find you cannot add your customizations using the policies in the 'Customizations' folder
=== please contact CA APIM Support so we can improve customization capability
This policy can be found and should be used as 'Encapsulated Assertion'!
This policy generates an id_token and exposes it as a JWT

L7p:value.stringValue: // Check if the client registered via OIDC Dynamic Registration and use registered values

L7p:Detail.stringValue: The id_token could not be created

L7p:Pattern.stringValue: code|code token|id_token|token id_token|code id_token|code id_token token
code|code token|id_token|token id_token|code id_token|code id_token token

L7p:Detail.stringValue: The id_token could not be created

L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName.stringValue: MAG Variable append - Third Party SSO Token Type

L7p:value.stringValue: // is signining algorithm in the supported list?
